entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain or ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Ice pellets beginning this morning then changing to freezing rain near noon. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or freezing rain. Temperature rising to 9 by morning.
entry.summary: Freezing rain changing to rain late this evening. Fog patches developing after midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Temperature rising to 9 by morning. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
